Test data is not included in the repository for size and copyright reasons. Use
the provided scripts to download test data:
  * download_faust.py - Goethe's Faust
    Source: https://www.projekt-gutenberg.org/goethe/faust1/
  * download_jargon.py - The Jargon File (Jargon Lexicon only)
    Source: http://www.catb.org/jargon/
